description: Delivered core features for a large-scale cross-platform app, including authentication, calling, and message reactions.
Refactored legacy code using Clean Architecture and SOLID principles for long-term maintainability.
Created a reusable design system for consistent UI across the app.
Improved code quality with unit and integration testing.
Adopted new tools and packages to streamline development and boost team productivity.
Developed and maintained cross-platform features for a large-scale mobile application with hundreds of thousands of active users.
Designed and implemented complex systems using Flutter, Vue.js, and Nest.js.
Contributed to the majority of features in the application, ensuring high performance and usability.
Collaborated closely with product owners and UX/UI designers to gather requirements and deliver user-centric solutions.
Set up CI/CD pipelines for both web and mobile platforms to automate builds and deployments.
Established scalable architecture and project structure following best practices in Flutter development.
Researched and adopted tools and technologies to improve development workflow and team efficiency.
Developed new features and optimized app performance using Flutter.
Redesigned UI of existing features for better usability.
Developed mobile apps using Flutter, with custom UI, animations, and platform-specific integrations.
Researched third-party APIs and Firebase services.
Built automated tests with Dart to ensure app quality.
